content:
Policy Cancellation and Refund Information:
Policy cancellation occurs automatically when the Domestic Helper's Work Permit or employment contract with the Employer in Singapore is terminated from the date of the Letter of Discharge from the Ministry of Manpower.

Refund for Policy Cancellation within three hundred sixty five days from the date of inception follows the scale of refund as indicated in policy wordings.
